Detailed Description

template<class fieldT>
class Lanczos< fieldT >

Lanczos algorithms.

Example: 

/// mdp_gauge U(lattice,nc);
/// fermi_field psi(lattice,nc);
/// coefficients coeff;
/// coeff["kappa"]=1.12;
/// for(int k=0; k<100; k++)
///    mdp << Lanczos::step(psi,U,coeff) << endl;
///
return mdp_complex(alpha,eta)
